name: Rat it!
description:
ARE YOU READY FOR ADVENTURE

As an outlaw alchemist drifting around the ocean. While exploring an abandoned pirate ship, You Have uncovered rats who have been corrupted by the evil spirits of the deep. It is your duty to pick up magical slingshot paired with alchemical projectiles to exterminate these monsters and uncover the secret in the ship.


WIELD YOUR SLINGSHOT
  • Dynamic VR aiming and shooting mechanism with the magical Slingshot.
  • Don't hesitate to shoot the devil creature.



SPECIAL PROJACTILE
  • Use different types of projectiles to develop your own style of strategy and grow as you play.


RICH CONTENT AND UNIQUE CREATURE
  • Meticulously crafted level designs and engaging interactive elements.
  • Advanced AI and mysterious evil boss. Learn to exploit their weaknesses.
